name: FileTract
title: Effortless AI Transaction Insights & Document Management
shortDescription: FileTract streamlines financial document management using AI to automatically extract, analyze, and organize transactions. Designed for businesses aiming to reduce manual data entry and enhance document organization, it integrates with accounting software for a seamless workflow. Example use case: A small business uses FileTract to automate expense tracking and improve financial reporting.
cons: Currently supports a few accounting software

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Expensify
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers expense management with AI features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Receipt Bank
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on data extraction from receipts
